title: Someone has hacked into my old email and i can no longer access it,,,
body: I want to change the email on my league account but cant because i cant get access to my previous email. Can someone help?

replies.body: We can help with restoring access to the account, just reach out to us through an [account recovery ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  In the meantime, use our[ protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to help secure anything accounts you have in and out of league.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
